channel.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
channel.description:
Time to have a lot of ToL Vets say this wouldn't work.
This is mainly a suggestion for the Forums, but it could be used for the games
> # [color=lighblue]The Resident[/color] > **[color=lighblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color]** > *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> **Converts into [color=purple]The Conspirator[/color] or [color=darkred]The Apostle[/color]**
> ## [color=purple]The Conspirator[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Social[/color]** > *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
still a bad idea imo.

The town “citizen” normally works when there are less PR’S then citizens or at least a big amount of cits. like 5 out of 12 town slots.

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
But both of them are guaranteed to spawn.

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It can have a guaranteed spawn but also have other non-guaranteed spawns.

Like the difference between Prince (1 always spawns) and ToL Sheriff/Paladin (at LEAST 1 always spawns)

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
I mean, these have to be exclusive. Either it’s guaranteed or not.

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Technically those are not mutually exclusive

Read full topic

item.description:
This takes it away

item.dc:creator: Emilia
item.description:
One of the games core is that it’s role madness

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Well there are 2 options:

  1. It is a guarenteed spawn
  2. It is not a guarenteed spawn

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
While I don’t think prince is balanced it’s for a different reason.

Prince doesn’t randomly spawn while this class does, I don’t think this should be standard but That’s just how I feel about it.

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
King is indeed not super balanced

Randomized faction helps with making it not OP but it does so by making it super swingy

Read full topic

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Also, king is unbalanced as it’s confirmed.

Read full topic

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
‘the class that gets brought up every two weeks as an example of an unbalanced class is unbalanced’

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Prince is Unbalanced unless it is no longer guarenteed then.

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
JakeTheWolfie:

a guarenteed 1-3 residents might be balanced

Guaranteed anything is unbalanced because it means that anyone who’s the sole Anything claimer is semi-confirmed starting BD

that’s why we cut guaranteed healers and sheriffadins

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
:I

Are you serious? you wouldn’t need to bait scum in the first place if you were a normal pr and not a random VT spawn.

I’m done here, feel like I’m talking to a brick wall

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Why isn’t it? You could ultimately soft anything heavily, and if the scum pick it up, you die. This protects the actual PRs

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
YES but it isn’t balanced for FOL either.

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
It literally is meant for FoL

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
No people don’t want to play it it’s boring and more suited for FM because the games are balanced around it TOL isn’t balanced around VT

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
People don’t like VT because it doesn’t get to do anything all game. This is a virtue, as your death doesn’t remove any power from the town in the long run.

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Not really, I don’t really think a role that doesn’t do much will help hosts that much. certainly not enough to put a role that isn’t balanced at all

every random spawn class should be near to equal I get that sometimes one class is just going to be more better.

I’m not trying to bash your ideas but I think theres a reason why people don’t like this one.

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
I mean, this role would also be favorable to hosts as it… does nothing.

But besides that, I think that a guarenteed 1-3 residents might be balanced, but I will need more than just my opinion on this.

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
yes because a class that is worse then every other class should just randomly spawn with the rest.

Your balance idea makes no sense.

Read full topic
item.source: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.title: The Resident / The Conspirator [BD Social / Unseen Social]

item.description:
It be hilarious for a April fools update for tol to just make everyone on both teams a vt. They all have their names and alignments they just cant use any abilities

Read full topic
